multiple_choice.choice: deliver oxygen-poor blood to the capillaries surrounding the alveoli of the lungs
return the blood, high in carbon dioxide and waste products, to the right side of the heart
deliver blood, rich with oxygen and nutrients, to capillary networks
return oxygen-rich blood to the left side of the heart

response.feedback: Incorrect. The pulmonary arteries deliver oxygen-poor blood to the lungs.
Correct. The veins of systemic circulation drain the capillary beds of the body and return that oxygen-poor blood to the heart.
Incorrect. The arteries of systemic system carry oxygen-rich blood to the tissues of the body.
Incorrect. The veins of the pulmonary circulation return oxygen-rich blood from the lungs to the heart.
